description.narrative: Promoting Sustainable Urban Development through Volunteer Service for the Beijing Winter Olympics

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

description.narrative:
Outcome 1 1.1 Number of researches reports on volunteer service for the Winter Olympics 1.2 Number of times of United Nations professional consultation or expert training provided for the establishment of the Winter Olympics volunteer service system 1.3 Number of researches on the effective experience of multiple cities in Beijing and Hebei province co-hosting the Olympics and on volunteer service for the Summer and Winter Olympics 1.4 Number of gender analysis developed
Outcome 2 2.1 Number of Olympic cities involved in the voluntary service collaboration network 2.2 Number of people participating in the International Volunteer Service Exchange Conferences (disaggregated by sex and handicap) 2.3 Number of participants in the seminars and workshops on different themes, such as volunteering for public health emergency response. (disaggregated by sex and handicap) 2.4 Number of people receiving the training on the SDGs among VIOs and volunteers, integrating with the goals of Beijing's urban governance and development (disaggregated by sex and handicap)
Outcome 3 3.1 Number of outstanding young talents who are selected to become UN Volunteers (disaggregated by sex) 3.2 Number of international volunteer management and evaluation manuals and International UN Volunteer success stories 3.3 Number of reports on expatriate volunteer evaluation and pilot projects 3.4 Number of trainees and trainers participating in the international volunteer service training (disaggregated by sex and handicap) 3.5 Number of participants in the training in promotion of gender equality (disaggregated by sex and handicap) 3.6 Number of participants covered by the advocacy activities for volunteerism and involved in volunteering activities. (disaggregated by sex and handicap) 3.7.1 Number of international volunteer talent pools 3.7.2 Number of people in the international volunteer talent pools and UNV Global Talent Pool (disaggregated by sex and handicap)

comment.narrative:
Outcome 1 1.1 0 researches reports on volunteer service for the Winter Olympics 1.2 0 times of United Nations professional consultation or expert training provided for the establishment of the Winter Olympics volunteer service system 1.3 0 researches on the effective experience of multiple cities in Beijing and Hebei province co-hosting the Olympics and on volunteer service for the Summer and Winter Olympics 1.4 0 gender analysis developed
Outcome 2 2.1 0 Olympic cities involved in the voluntary service collaboration network 2.2 0 people participating in the International Volunteer Service Exchange Conferences (disaggregated by sex and handicap) 2.3 0 participants in the seminars and workshops on different themes, such as volunteering for public health emergency response. (disaggregated by sex and handicap) 2.4 0 people receiving the training on the SDGs among VIOs and volunteers, integrating with the goals of Beijing's urban governance and development (disaggregated by sex and handicap)
Outcome 3 3.1 0 outstanding young talents who are selected to become UN Volunteers (disaggregated by sex) 3.2 0 international volunteer management and evaluation manuals and International UN Volunteer success stories 3.3 0 reports on expatriate volunteer evaluation and pilot projects 3.4 0 trainees and trainers participating in the international volunteer service training (disaggregated by sex and handicap) 3.5 0 participants in the training in promotion of gender equality (disaggregated by sex and handicap) 3.6 0 participants covered by the advocacy activities for volunteerism and involved in volunteering activities. (disaggregated by sex and handicap) 3.7.1 0 international volunteer talent pools 3.7.2 0 people in the international volunteer talent pools and UNV Global Talent Pool (disaggregated by sex and handicap)

Outcome 1 1.1 1 researches reports on volunteer service for the Winter Olympics 1.2 2 times of United Nations professional consultation or expert training provided for the establishment of the Winter Olympics volunteer service system
Outcome 2 2.1 3 Olympic cities involved in the voluntary service collaboration network 2.2 200 people participating in the International Volunteer Service Exchange Conferences (disaggregated by sex and handicap) 2.3 50 participants in the seminars and workshops on different themes, such as volunteering for public health emergency response. (disaggregated by sex and handicap)
Outcome 3 3.1 6 National UN Youth Volunteers and 2 National UN Volunteer Specialists selected to become UN Volunteers (disaggregated by sex) 3.3 2 reports on expatriate volunteer evaluation and pilot projects 3.4 80 trainees and trainers participating in the international volunteer service training (disaggregated by sex and handicap) 3.5 80 participants in the training in promotion of gender equality (disaggregated by sex and handicap) 3.6 100 participants covered by the advocacy activities for volunteerism and involved in volunteering activities. (disaggregated by sex and handicap) 3.7.1 1 international volunteer talent pools 3.7.2 100 people in the international volunteer talent pools and UNV Global Talent Pool (disaggregated by sex and handicap)
To be reported at the end of 2021
